Strategic Plan Slide Show       Go to slide 1    Go to slide 2    Go to slide 3    Go to slide 4    Go to slide 5                Go to the next slide    Go to the previous slide                 Go to the next slide    Go to the previous slide                 Go to the next slide    Go to the previous slide                 Go to the next slide    Go to the previous slide                 Go to the next slide    Go to the previous slide               Strategic Plan Accordian     MISSION         Mission Text Block   To enable excellence through information technology        VISION         Vision Text block   To be a trusted strategic partner for innovative and transformative information technology solutions        VALUES         Values text block     Values Text block   Collaboration  We work to develop, expand and enhance partnerships across the university and its community while promoting collaboration and shared knowledge.  Excellence We strive for the best customer service, are proactive in our planning and responsive when issues arise.     Empty as well   Innovation  We utilize our talents to foster innovative and creative solutions.  Integrity We act responsibly, ethically, and without bias, basing our decisions on facts and data. We recognize our role as public employees and work sustainably and with stewardship.     column 3   People We encourage professional and personal growth and respect the work/life balance of our employees. We show each other respect and listen to each other’s thoughts and ideas.  Transparency We openly communicate internally and with the university community to foster accountability.           PRINCIPLES         Principes text block   As an organization, we agree to the following principles to guide our work.       bullet points     bullet points    Be a good steward of resources  Be a people-first place to work      bullet points two electric bugaloo    Be intentional in our partnerships  Commit to continuous improvement and learning      column 3    Deliver customer-centered service  Embrace an innovative culture of ideas and solutions            STRATEGIC GOALS         intro text   The following organizational goals have short term and long term activities with detailed action plans and projects.       Strategic Goals Text block     Strategic goals text block    Achieve fiscal sustainability  Align our service portfolio to meet the needs of the university  Balance resources to innovate while maintaining service excellence      bullet points    Enhance University’s information security and privacy posture to reduce cyber risks  Improve customer satisfaction  Improve staff recruitment, retention, and development  Improve the reputation of the department throughout the university      bullets three    Incubate innovative ideas from across the university  Make data-driven decisions  Mature the implementation of service management practices  Strengthen partnerships for ongoing and future university needs                 ACCC Projects & Strategic Goals          About           Identity    Leadership    Policies    Reports    Jobs
